resource.chars:
It would not be difficult 
to add to the number of 
<s>these <\s> citations such as 
these - but these I 
have brought forward 
will perhaps be 
considered sufficient 
to justify the opinion 
that Dr. Radcliffe’s paper 
is wholly unfit for the 
Philosophical Transactions 
Thomas H. Huxley 
The Committee of Papers
